Name: Hichkii Restaurant
Address: Masjid chowk, Tana Rd, Magarhatta, Hajipur, Bihar 844101
Reviews: It is not restaurant it is an hotel very small the best restaurant in hajipur is dana pani and golden curry but hich ki food is good but very costly by other restaurant
We are small restaurant, but not costly,will you please tell me, which food price is more than any restaurant at hajipur?

I never had such good quality of food in hajipur.
The place is great and the quality and quantity of food is amazing.
And also ambience is pretty good.

Name: The Orange
Reviews: Nice place to dine in. liked the food. Ambiance is beautiful. The staff behaviour is polite. They also provided our group a party space.

Woooo very tasty , spicy... Looovvvve it
Specially lollypop..
Interior decoration marvelous....
#theorange
It is too gd for party ... Loved a lot... Interior designing iss awesome

Name: The Garam Masala

Reviews: A small decent place to chill out. Decent to good level food.
Best place for biryani in hajipur.
Best Biryani Sellar In Hajipur

Name: The Golden Curry
Address: Above IDBI BANK, Dakbanglow Chowk Konhara Ghat Road, Bihar 844101
Reviews: Amazing Food and ambience with such an unbelievable low price .A must visit  place in Hajipur for persons of all age .Just loved everything over here . Please come here and take away happy memories:)
Really nice place for dine out. The behaviour of their workers also better . Quality of food is awesome. Price for foods are mid range.

Best for small gathering, like party functions, birthday and all.
Interior design are kinda attractive and very nice. I lub interior portion than that of inferior.
Parking your vehicle is big issue you gonna face.

Name: My First Flight Restaurant
Reviews: Good service at this place. Very nice and clean inside the restaurant. Price are almost average. Food quality were also quite good. Its almost feels like we were in an Aeroplane.

For the town like Hajipur it is a good place to enjoy . you can celebrate birthdays , anniversary and many more. The best part of this place is it's interior . you will feel that you are actually in the aeroplane . As per it's name it has â€¦
